Type.Name: RSA

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RSA extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.summary: Abtract base class for all implementations of RSA public key algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.RSA Create() cil managed

Docs.summary: Create an instance of the default RSA implementation.
Docs.returns: To be added: an object of type 'RSA'

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.RSA Create(string algName) cil managed

Docs.param: To be added: an object of type 'string'
Docs.summary: Create an instance of the specified RSA implementation.
Docs.returns: To be added: an object of type 'RSA'

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] DecryptValue(unsigned int8[] rgb) cil managed

Docs.summary: Raw (unpadded) decryption using the RSA private key.
Docs.returns: An array of bytes containing the decrypted data.
Docs.remarks: Direct (raw) decryption (i.e. without padding) is discouraged due to high security risks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] EncryptValue(unsigned int8[] rgb) cil managed

Docs.summary: Raw (unpadded) encryption using the RSA public key.
Docs.returns: An array of bytes containing the encrypted data.
Docs.remarks: Direct (raw) encryption (i.e. without padding) is discouraged due to high security risks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters ExportParameters(bool includePrivateParameters) cil managed

Docs.param: True to include private parameters; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Export the instance key into a structure.
Docs.returns: a RSAParameters structure contaning each parameters of the key.
Docs.remarks: You are responsable to zeroize the private key ( parameters , , , , and ) if you export it from the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void FromXmlString(string xmlString) cil managed

Docs.param: An string containing a RSA key in XML.
Docs.summary: Import the RSA key from the specified XML string.
Docs.remarks: The schema definition for RSA keys is detailled in section 4.4.2.2 of the "XML-Signature Syntax and Processing" available at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ImportParameters(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters parameters) cil managed

Docs.param: A RSAParameters containing the RSA key parameters.
Docs.summary: Import the key from the structure into the current instance.
Docs.remarks: Parameters D, P and Q are required to import an RSA private key. Parameters DP, DQ and InverseQ will be used for the Chinese Remainder Theorem (CRT) optimization if available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToXmlString(bool includePrivateParameters) cil managed

Docs.param: True to include private parameters; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Convert the current RSA key into an XML string.
Docs.returns: An XML string containing the representation of the RSA key.
Docs.remarks: The schema definition for RSA keys is detailled in section 4.4.2.2 of the "XML-Signature Syntax and Processing" available at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/
